alfredsnippet.snippet:
Richard Thwaites, Panorama, Canberra Times, 5/5/12, p.30

"How do we know what is real? A glance at any newspaper reminds us that belief is as remote from reason as ever, and no less powerful for the accumulated knowledge and philosophy of the centuries."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - How Do We Know What is Real?
